name: coolify
tagline: A self-hosted platform for deploying apps and databases on your servers
description: Coolify is an open-source alternative to Heroku and Netlify designed for self-hosters. It provides an easy-to-use UI for deploying applications, databases, and static sites on your own infrastructure using Docker or Kubernetes.

features.title: Heroku Alternative
features.description: Deploy apps with the same ease as Heroku. No vendor lock-in

features.title: One
features.description: Launch applications, databases, and sites instantly. Simplified deployment process

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Support for both container orchestration platforms. Choose your stack

features.title: Git Integration
features.description: Automatic deployments from GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket. CI/CD built-in

features.title: Database Management
features.description: Deploy and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and more. Complete stack solution

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own PaaS on any infrastructure. Full control, zero monthly fees
